snippet: The German carmaker Daimler sold half of its stake in European Aeronautic Defense and Space on Thursday as part of a realignment of the ownership structure of the aerospace company.
abstract: The German carmaker Daimler sold half of its stake in European Aeronautic Defense and Space on Thursday as part of a realignment of the ownership structure of the aerospace company.

headline.main: Daimler Sells Half Its Stake in EADS for $2.2 Billion

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
